title: Sweet Thing (Reprise)
lyrics:
The reprise of “Sweet Thing”. The end of the previous song, “Candidate” leads into it. The song completes the medley between “Sweet Thing”, “Candidate”, and itself.
[Chorus]
If you want it, boys, get it here, thing
For hope, boys, is a cheap thing, cheap thing
[Outro]
Is it nice in your snow storm, freezing your brain?
Do you think that your face looks the same?
Then let it be, it's all I ever wanted
It's a street with a deal and a taste
It's got claws, it's got me, it's got you
